Uses of Class
mgui.geometry.Triangle3D

  • Packages that use Triangle3D 
    Package Description
    mgui.geometry
    Provides 2D and 3D geometry representations and utilities for all shapes used in ModelGUI.
    mgui.geometry.util

      Returns a 3D triangle for face i.
